name: Contrariorum
description:
Contrariorum

Contrariorum is a puzzle game with an easy mechanic to understand, but it contains a brain bending experience. Control characters and move them onto their respective ends. Use boxes to make new paths for the characters to explore, or get rid of them to free a path.

Current Build

This version of the game is currently still in early access. as it is still a prototype. Concepts are still subject to change between versions. This game is therefore still in develop, meaning feedback is welcome and even encouraged so that the developers can ensure a better experience. Bugs that you found or suggestions to the game can be left as a comment.

Development

Development started when the team experimented with 1-bit art, and how the art can make a game. This made the idea of having walls being pathways for the other characters. This idea was quickly taken by the team and turned into the idea of Contrariorum, the Latin word for opposites.
